name: Indepandance Day
description:
You are the last panda with the cure. Make sure to survive the Pandamonium that is driving every panda in this town crazy! 

Created by LightBit Games (in 15 whole hours) for the The Panda-mic Game Jam. 

Credits:

John Spantouris - Programming

Caterina Giamarellou - Logo, UI, Texturing

Angelo Tsiflas - 3D, Design

Instructions:
Move around with W/A/S/D

Left-click anywhere on the screen to cure nearby pandas

Your objective is to heal all pandas and not get infected yourself in the process.
